Lde/ecspride/MainActivity;->onCreate:(La: This method originates user data by obtaining the device ID using the `getDeviceId()` method of the `TelephonyManager` class. Specifically, it uses the `android.telephony.TelephonyManager` service to retrieve the device ID and stores it as the `imei` field in a `BaseClass` instance.  It also uses the `SmsManager` to send a text message with the content "+49 1234".  Because this method uses the `TelephonyManager` and `SmsManager`, it is a sink for user data.  The `Next Methods` list is empty due to the identified sink.
